title: What are some impediments thay make Jacque Fresco's Venus Project not viable? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are no faults inherent in the resource based economy philosophy. The impediments are in humanity. A simple refusal to accept betterment for all, leading to closed minds. Only people with open minds and hearts are fully capable of embracing it. Like children. Unencumbered by dogma, they see the potential right away. That's why so many youngsters have turned away from the right wing selfishness.
